sentence.Network_en: She suffered from anaemia and even required blood transfusions.
sentence.Network_cn: 她患有贫血症，甚至需要输血。

sentence.Network_en: Symptoms of anaemia include weakness, fatigue and iron deficiency.
sentence.Network_cn: 贫血的症状包括虚弱、疲劳和缺铁。

sentence.Network_en: I was put on iron tablets for my anaemia.
sentence.Network_cn: 我曾因贫血吃补铁药片.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 贫血(anaemia)是指全身循环血液中红细胞总量减少至正常值以下。但由于全身循环血液中红细胞总量的测定技术比较复杂，所以临床 …
以an开头的单词_百度知道 ... answer 回答，答案 anaemia 贫血，贫血症 anaerobe 厌氧性生物.
血字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 血库〖 bloodbank〗 血亏〖 anaemia〗 血泪〖 tearsofblood〗.

list.abs: 在动物方面，缺乏叶酸会引起巨红血球性贫血(macrocytic anaemia)和白血球减少症(leucopenia)，检验叶酸缺乏症可测定胺基酸代谢 …

溶血性贫血（Haemolytic anaemia）指因红细胞大量溶解导致的贫血。 >>更多牙疾病牙疾病是宠物中最常见的疾病。
何谓严重疾病附条？(上) - 南洋商报 ... 16. 瘫痪( Paralysis) 17. 再生障碍性贫血( Aplastic Anaemia) 18. 脑炎( Encephalitis).

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: via modern Latin from Greek anaimia, from an- 'without' + haima 'blood'

entry.def: Anaemia is a medical condition in which there are too few red cells in your blood, causing you to feel tired and look pale.

example.ex: She suffered from anaemia and even required blood transfusions.
example.tran: 她患有贫血症，甚至需要输血。

means.word_mean: 2. a deficiency of red blood cells

auth_sentence.content: In February this year doctors diagnosed severe aplastic anaemia.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: In February this year doctors diagnosed severe aplastic anaemia.

sentences.en: The doctor analysed the blood sample for anaemia.
sentences.cn: 医生化验血样看是否贫血。

sentences.en: I was put on iron tablets for my anaemia.
